section.para: To view Work Order Material Requirements by component Item, select the "W/O Material Requirements by Component Item" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Work Order Material Requirements by Component Item

section.para: When displaying Work Order Material Requirements by component Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose Work Order Material Requirements you want to view.
Select to display Work Order Material Requirements by component Item for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Work Order Material Requirements by component Item you want to display.
Display lists Work Order Material Requirements by component Item, using the specified parameters.
Total balance required will also display. The "Due Date" column is color-coded for ease of use. If the due date is past due, the date will display in red.
